file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.0"
info:
  title: Jackal API
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  /api/v1/crop:
    get:
      summary: Fetch image and try to crop it to specified size
      parameters:
      - name: url
        in: query
        description: url for image to be cropped
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: width
        in: query
        description: width of cropped image
        required: true
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int32
      - name: height
        in: query
        description: height of cropped image
        required: true
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int32
      - name: type
        in: query
        description: Type of crop. Allowed choices default and ratio
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Response with cropped image
          content:
            image/jpeg:
              schema:
                type: string
                format: binary
            image/png:
              schema:
                type: string
                format: binary
            image/gif:
              schema:
                type: string
                format: binary
        '400':
          description: Bad request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/CropErrors"

components:
  schemas:
    CropErrors:
      type: object
      properties:
        errors:
          type: object
          properties:
            url:
              type: string
            width:
              type: string
            height:
              type: string
